data.title: Austin Public Library - Windsor Park
data.description: Upright Grand. Tuned fairly well, a few notes are out but otherwise playable.

data.title: Chez Zee - Balcones Dr
data.description: Baldwin Baby Grand. They do Live Music at their Sunday Brunches.

data.title: King Bee - 12th
data.description: Upright. Located next to the cigarette machine.

data.title: Juiceland - 4th and Brazos
data.description: Upright. Well tuned, small location and the music they usually play is loud.

data.title: Fairmont Austin - Red River
data.description:
I'm pretty sure this location has two pianos. There's the clear grand from Lucid, and then I saw a black baby
grand walking by there the other day. Wanted to go in to check them out but was too nervous.

data.title: Planet K - Stassney
data.description: Upright. By the entrance to the Stassney Lane location.

data.title: Planet K - Bee Cave
data.description: Upright. Reported to be out of Tune.

data.title: Planet K - Lamar
data.description: Looks like they may have an upright outside from one photo I saw online. Status unknown.

data.title: White Horse
data.description: Upright. By the outdoor area, just inside where the pool table is. Status unknown.
